ygData.subject: VEESHAN EVENT: PLEASE READ!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Im trying to organzie a slaughter of the Goboos that have been plauging Rivervale for some years now on the Server of Veeshan. Runnyeye Dungeon ranges
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

Im trying to organzie a slaughter of the Goboos that have been plauging
Rivervale for some years now on the Server of Veeshan. Runnyeye Dungeon
ranges in levels from 5-35. So this event will be a benefit for all
involved. There is no date set as of yet. This will be one of the first of
many events to come on the Veeshan server. Here is a list of what we will
need in order to get this underway, and I will happy to organize it and
accept any help in doing so...

-1- Players, its obvious, we need people interested in Clearing out all
the Goblins and other dark monsters that lurk in Runnyeye.
-2- An experienced guide who knowsALL of Runnyeye. I have not gone deep,
but i know there are some out there who have.
-3- Binders to bind players to Rivervale for the event.
-4- Maybe a dontaion booth to collect tarnished and bronze weapons as
well as leather armor to hook up players who are in need.
-5- Buffers, to boost up the weaker characters.

Right now thats all I can see that is needed right now. If you are
interested, email me and I will get a NEWS section put up on EQ VAULT. I
have had a few responses so far and it looks like this could work. This will
be the first of many events on Veeshan and I hope all the players can help
me make this happen. This will happen on a weekend, I work during the week
as does most of the world, and a weekend afternoon is best, probably 12 Noon
EST on a SAT or SUN. But, this is open to change.

-Dycedarg
Knight of the Cleansing Flame
